bibl.title: Abbreviations and Lexicography.
bibl.note: 1. Abbreviation by ligature [μή(τηρ) - not γη(ραιός) in C.P.R. XIII passim; ἡμ(έ)(ρα); μή(ν)]. - 2. Names compounded with -μηνος and -ημερος abbreviated. - 3. The ending and gender of substantives compounded with μήν and ἡμέρα. - 4. Origin of the errors in our lexica.
